title: Is the NBA No Country for Old Men? | The Answer
description:
Chris is joined by The Ringer’s Shea Serrano to look back at the LaMarcus Aldridge era of the Spurs in light of the recent news that Aldridge and the Spurs are looking to part ways (01:30). Later, Chris is joined by Justin Verrier to discuss the list of former All-Stars currently past their primes in the trade and buyout market who might be serviceable on contending teams (14:30).
Host: Chris Ryan
Guests: Shea Serrano and Justin Verrier
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
